vulnerable_code: public class Be { public static void main(String[] args) { new HostnameVerifier(){ @Override public boolean verify(String hostname, SSLSession session) { return true; } }; } }
description: The code is creating a custom hostname verifier that blindly returns true, which effectively bypasses any hostname verification and exposes the application to man-in-the-middle attacks.
recommendation: Properly implement the HostnameVerifier interface to perform adequate hostname verification based on the application's security requirements.
